definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:PlayerSkillPoints</field><value name="VAL"><block type="get_command_parameter_number"><field name="param">amount</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="get_command_parameter_entity"><field name="param">name</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Skill Points have been changed to </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_format_number"><value name="number"><block type="get_command_parameter_number"><field name="param">amount</field></block></value><value name="format"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">##</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="get_command_parameter_entity"><field name="param">name</field></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
